comments:
In several places(PreClientDevelopCommand, GenSampleWidgetBinding, and 
PreServiceDevelopCommand), the code tries to find the index of "/" and split up 
the module and project substrings.

In some cases, this is not warranted and the index will be -1.

Besides fixing the indexOutofBounds problem, we should be caching the index 
rather than making numerous indexOf("/") calls so as not to impede 
performance. ;)

Hi Kathy, 
I have attached the patches for this problem.  Without them, I am not able to 
get as far in the RC1 stream before hitting the server error(97948).

Let me know if you see any problems with this.

Thanks!
